name: Column Bookmarks oTTo 1.9.3.1 [fx-3.6]
description:
your 'heavy' bookmarks-folder in columns
only change the label-name

Edit :
works well with folder or sub-folder in the personal-toolbar
works bad in the bookmarks-menu
so please remove #bookmarksBarContent if you want to test it in bookmarks-menu

add separators in your folder, to separate much better your 'chapters' : see code

for more and questions : the french official mozilla firefox forum 'geckozone' at
http://www.geckozone.org/forum/viewtopic.php?p=481305#481305

for 3.6, just change width of menupopup .scrollbox-innerbox to 650px (value of menupopup .popup-internal-box)
